channel.title: Cosmic Runes and Noted Drops?
channel.description:
[ul]Hey, just something quick.
[list] [li]Does anybody know any NPCs in [b]F2P[/b] that drop Cosmic runes?[/li] [li]Does anybody know any NPCs in [b]F2P[/b] that drop noted items (any)?[/li] [/list]
Any level, any where.
Thanks for reading.[/ul]

item.title: Cosmic Runes and Noted Drops?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Cosmic rune: http://www.runehq.com/database.php?type=item&id=000301

Armoured zombie, Bandit (level 57), Bandit (level 74), Bandit looter, Banshee, Barbarian (woman) (level 8), Big frog, Black Knight, Black Knight Titan, Catablepon (level 68), Cave slime, Chaos dwarf, Chaos dwarf hand cannoneer, Chaos dwogre, Cockroach worker, Corporeal Beast, Cyclops (Ardougne Zoo), Dark wizard, Dark Wizard (with beard), General Graardor, Ghast (level 139), Ghast (level 30), Ghostly warrior, Giant frog, Giant skeleton (level 80), Hill Giant, Hobgoblin (level 28), Hobgoblin (level 42), Ice giant, Ice queen, Ice Warrior, Kalphite Worker, Locust rider, Lord Daquarius, Melzar the mad, Mighty banshee, Molanisk, Moss giant (level 42), Necromancer, Otherworldly being, Renegade Knight, Rock Crab, Saradomin Wizard, Scabaras Lancer, Scabaras mage (level 88), Scabaras Mage (level 98), Scarab mage, Sergeant Grimspike, Sergeant Steelwill, Sergeant Strongstack, Shadow Warrior, Skeleton (level 25), Skeleton (level 45), Skeleton (Scimitar and Shield), Skeleton fremennik (40), Skeleton fremennik (50), Sorebones, Undead Troll (level 100), Wall Beast, Wizard, Zombie (level 24), Zombie hand, Zombie pirate, Zombie pirate, Zombie swab

Rune ess: http://www.runehq.com/database.php?type=item&id=001331

[quote]
Abyssal demon, Abyssal guardian, Abyssal leech, Abyssal walker, Catablepon (level 49), Catablepon (level 64), Catablepon (level 68), Minotaur (level 12), Minotaur (level 27), Undead Troll (level 74)
[/quote][/quote]
Aha, I’ll be using this, Vain! Thanks!

I would use this myself only my computer doesn’t load it up, neither can I access the KB on RS.

Read full topic
